mapper.insert: insert into admin (a_id, a_account, a_password, a_type, a_power, a_name, a_sex, a_phone, n_id) values (#{aId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aPower,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{aName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aPhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update admin set a_account = #{aAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_password = #{aPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_type = #{aType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_power = #{aPower,jdbcType=TINYINT}, a_name = #{aName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_sex = #{aSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_phone = #{aPhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, n_id = #{nId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where a_id = #{aId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a_id, a_account, a_password, a_type, a_power, a_name, a_sex, a_phone, n_id from admin
select a_id, a_account, a_password, a_type, a_power, a_name, a_sex, a_phone, n_id from admin where a_phone = #{phone}
select a_id, a_account, a_password, a_type, a_power, a_name, a_sex, a_phone, n_id from admin where a_phone = #{phone} or a_account = #{phone}
